meaningMnemonic: You use your <radical>fingers</radical> to hold the <radical>roof</radical> of the <radical>festival</radical> up, but it <kanji>rub</kanji>s against them. The roof is heavy, and you have to walk to keep up, so the roof is rubbing against them really, really badly.
readingMnemonic: Just when you thought the <kanji>rub</kanji>bing couldn't get any worse, <reading>Satsu</reading>ki (さつ) appears and hops up onto the roof. AAGH! It hurts!
